name: Lost Island (jpiolho)
description:
Welcome to Lost Island! You are:

A traveller who sails from port to port, discovering new and exciting lands. One day, on one of your travels, you stumble upon a small island that appears deserted, decrepit and lifeless. Despite all of this, you see some potential and take it upon yourself to bring new life to this land.

  • Explore every nook and corner and collect tools, such as an axe, a lighter and some seeds.
  • Cut down dead trees, plant new ones, light up some torches, and watch as the island slowly gets more and more colourful.
  • Pay attention to the clock - you need to head back to the docks and sail home every night.

Have fun and thank you for keeping the Lost Island alive!
